settings.title: Smart Performance cover
settings.content: The soft and breathable cover provides maximum airflow to keep you cool and fresh all night.

settings.title: Memory foam layer
settings.content: A luxurious 1.5cm layer of quality memory foam moulds perfectly to your unique shape for blissful comfort.

settings.title: The Octaspring® layer
settings.content: Our Octaspring® technology combines the comfort of foam with the support of springs.

settings.title: Memory foam base
settings.content: A base layer of memory foam delivers superior support & pressure relief regardless of the surface underneath.

settings.bonus-gift-content: What goes into the Octasmart® Deluxe Mattress Topper?

settings.listtitle: Find out more about the Deluxe Topper and it's magic pressure-relieving properties.

settings.title: Say goodbye to aches and pains
Octaspring® technology
settings.content: Designed to draw in fresh air

settings.title: Memory foam
settings.content: For optimal support and pressure relief

settings.title: Octaspring® Aerospace Technology
settings.content: Combining the support of springs with the comfort of foam, our award-winning Octaspring®️ technology, originally used in aircraft seating, was repurposed by our sleep experts to create the perfect surface for you to fall asleep faster, deeper and for longer.

settings.title: 8x More Breathable
settings.content:
The Octaspring® structure is not only 8x more breathable than most standard foam, it also creates its own micro-climate to regulate your temperature for cool, dry comfort all night long.

Inside the Octasprings is an Octavent™ air system which works to expel hot air and draw fresh cool air back in, reducing your body’s temperature by 3 degrees.

settings.title: Layers of luxurious memory foam
settings.content: With top and bottom layers of open-cell memory foam and a core of patented Octaspring® technology, this topper cradles your body in comfort all night long.

settings.title: Proven faster, deeper, longer sleep
settings.content: Confirmed by an independent sleep study, sleeping on our multi-award-winning Octaspring® technology promises you'll fall asleep faster, deeper, and as long as 8 minutes longer.

settings.title: Fresher sleep
settings.content: The Octasmart® Deluxe Topper is wrapped in a Smart Performance cover which is latex free and contains hypo-allergenic properties to provide you with a fresh, healthier sleeping environment. It's machine washable and made of ultra-soft material for that extra snuggly comfort!

settings.heading: Is the topper cover machine washable?
settings.row_content: Yes, the cover is machine washable at 40°C.

settings.heading: How can I stop the topper from moving around?
settings.row_content: The topper is created using a non-slip material to enable it to stay in place. To further reduce movement without compromising the topper, we suggest placing a deep fitted sheet over the mattress and topper, or use a sheet on the mattress and another on the topper.

settings.heading: Can I use an electric blanket on my topper?
settings.row_content: No, we don't recommend using an electric blanket because over time it can have an adverse effect on the materials used inside the topper.

settings.heading: What makes the Octasmart® Deluxe Topper cooler than other toppers?
settings.row_content: The Octasmart® Deluxe Topper features our patented Octaspring® technology which is 8x more breathable than most standard foams. This natural airflow allows you to sleep cooler. We don't use surface chemicals, which lose their cool once you lay on them, or put holes in our foam, which flatten out when you lay down, like other companies do, so you can sleep cool at night.

settings.heading: Why is keeping cool so important for getting a good night's sleep?
settings.row_content: Your body temperature naturally falls in the evening, signalling that it's time for bed. A lower temperature also tells your body to produce melatonin, the sleep hormone. There's no doubt that you get better sleep when you're cool and comfortable (not hot and sweaty). The American Sleep Foundation has even recognised temperature as the #1 disrupter of sleep.
